query.statement:
SELECT *
FROM ( SELECT T3.MANDT AS MANDT ,T3.POSID AS POSID ,T3.POST1 AS POST1 ,T3.MATNR AS MATNR ,T3.TXZ01 AS TXZ01 ,T3.EBELN AS EBELN ,T3.EBELP AS EBELP ,T3.CHNDAT AS CHNDAT ,T3.GUBN AS GUBN ,T3.PO_MENGE AS PO_MENGE ,T3.MENGE AS MENGE ,T3.MENGE1 AS MENGE1 ,T3.BLOCK_NO AS BLOCK_NO , VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_BUDAT(T3.MANDT,T3.EBELN,T3.EBELP),'') AS BUDAT -- 입고일 , VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_MPASS(T3.MANDT,T3.EBELN,T3.EBELP),0) AS MPASS -- 입고수량 ,T3.EINDT AS EINDT -- 최초 납품 예정일 ,T3.UDATE AS UDATE
FROM ( SELECT M13.MANDT AS MANDT -- CLIENT ,M13.EBELN AS EBELN -- 발주번호 ,M13.EBELP AS EBELP -- 품목번호 ,M13.POSID AS POSID -- 공사번호 ,M13.POST1 AS POST1 -- 현장명 ,P4.IDNRK AS MATNR -- 자재번호 ,M13.TXZ01 AS TXZ01 -- 품명 ,P4.CRDAT AS CHNDAT -- 변경일 ,CASE WHEN P4.PRCTYP = 'C' THEN ( CASE WHEN P4.OLD_QUAN > 0 THEN ( CASE WHEN P4.MENGE > P4.OLD_QUAN THEN '1' WHEN P4.MENGE < P4.OLD_QUAN THEN '2' ELSE '3' END) ELSE '3' END) ELSE '4' END AS GUBN -- 구분 ,M13.MENGE AS PO_MENGE -- 발주수량 ,P4.MENGE AS MENGE -- 신수량 ,P4.OLD_QUAN AS MENGE1 -- 구수량 ,CASE WHEN M11.BLOCK_NO = '' THEN '' WHEN M11.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'A%' THEN 'A' WHEN M11.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'B%' THEN 'B' WHEN M11.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'C%' THEN 'C' WHEN M11.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'D%' THEN 'D' WHEN M11.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'E%' THEN 'E' END AS BLOCK_NO -- BLOCK ,M13.EINDT AS EINDT -- 최초 납품 예정일 ,M13.UDATE AS UDATE -- ,P4.LIFNR2 AS LIFNR2 FROM ( SELECT P4.MANDT, P4.WOKNUM, P4.CRDAT, P4.MENGE, P4.OLD_QUAN, P4.PRCTYP, P4.MATKL, P4.IDNRK ,
( CASE WHEN P4.MATKL IN ('D375A04', 'D375A', 'E331A', 'E331C01', 'E322A') THEN ( SELECT MAX(A.LIFNR) FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT013 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.MARA AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.MATNR = B.MATNR WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.POSID = P4.WOKNUM || '-P' AND B.BLOCK_NO IN ('E322C01', 'E322C02', 'E322C03', 'E322C04', 'AR11')) WHEN P4.MATKL IN ('C2620', 'E280A', 'E280B') THEN ( SELECT MAX(LIFNR) FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT013 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND POSID = P4.WOKNUM || '-P' AND EKGRP = '117' )
WHEN P4.MATKL = 'A2000' THEN ( CASE WHEN P4.ZPART = '1' THEN ( SELECT MAX(LIFNR) FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT013 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND POSID = P4.WOKNUM || '-P' AND EXTWG = 'BOX02') WHEN P4.ZPART = '2' THEN ( SELECT MAX(LIFNR) FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT013 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND POSID = P4.WOKNUM || '-P' AND EKGRP = '117') WHEN P4.ZPART = '3' THEN ( SELECT MAX(LIFNR) FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT013 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND POSID = P4.WOKNUM || '-P' AND EXTWG = 'BOX09') ELSE '' END ) ELSE '' END ) AS LIFNR2 FROM ( SELECT A.MANDT AS MANDT ,A.WOKNUM AS WOKNUM ,CASE WHEN MAX(A.PRCTYP) IN ('C','D') THEN A.CRDAT ELSE B.CRDAT END AS CRDAT ,A.IDNRK AS IDNRK ,SUM( ( CASE WHEN A.PRCTYP='D' THEN 0 ELSE A.MENGE END) * ( CASE WHEN B.PRCTYP IS NULL THEN 1 WHEN B.PRCTYP='D' THEN 0 ELSE B.MENGE END) ) AS MENGE ,SUM( ( CASE WHEN A.PRCTYP='C' THEN ( CASE WHEN A.OLD_QUAN > 0 THEN A.OLD_QUAN ELSE A.MENGE END) ELSE A.MENGE END) * ( CASE WHEN B.PRCTYP IS NULL THEN 1 WHEN B.PRCTYP='D' THEN B.MENGE ELSE B.OLD_QUAN END) ) AS OLD_QUAN ,MAX( CASE WHEN A.PRCTYP= 'C' OR B.PRCTYP = 'C' THEN 'C' WHEN A.PRCTYP='D' OR B.PRCTYP = 'D' THEN 'D' ELSE '' END) AS PRCTYP ,MAX(A.MATKL) AS MATKL ,MAX(A.ZPART) AS ZPART FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MANDT ,WOKNUM ,CRDAT ,MATNR ,IDNRK ,MENGE ,OLD_QUAN ,PRCTYP ,MATKL ,ZPART ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY MANDT,WOKNUM,MATNR,IDNRK,ITEM_SEQ,MATKL ORDER BY MANDT,WOKNUM,MATNR,IDNRK,ITEM_SEQ,CRDAT DESC,SEQNO DESC) AS ROWNO FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND WOKNUM LIKE #POSID# || '%'
AND WOKNUM LIKE '_%'
AND IDNRK LIKE #MATNR# || '%'
AND CRDAT BETWEEN #UDATE1# AND #UDATE2# AND PRCTYP IN ( 'C','D')
) AS A WHERE ROWNO = 1) AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MANDT ,WOKNUM ,CRDAT ,MATNR ,IDNRK ,MENGE ,OLD_QUAN ,PRCTYP ,MATKL ,ZPART ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY MANDT,WOKNUM,MATNR,IDNRK,ITEM_SEQ,MATKL ORDER BY MANDT,WOKNUM,MATNR,IDNRK,ITEM_SEQ,CRDAT DESC,SEQNO DESC) AS ROWNO FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND WOKNUM LIKE #POSID# || '%'
AND WOKNUM LIKE '_%'
AND CRDAT BETWEEN #UDATE1# AND #UDATE2# AND IDNRK IN (
SELECT DISTINCT MATNR FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND WOKNUM LIKE #POSID# || '%'
AND WOKNUM LIKE '_%'
AND CRDAT BETWEEN #UDATE1# AND #UDATE2# AND PRCTYP IN ( 'C','D')) ) AS B WHERE ROWNO = 1 ) AS B ON B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.WOKNUM = A.WOKNUM AND B.IDNRK = A.MATNR WHERE A.ROWNO=1 AND A.CRDAT BETWEEN #UDATE1# AND #UDATE2# AND A.MATKL IN ('D375A04', 'D375A', 'E331A', 'E331C01', 'E322A', 'A2000', 'C2620', 'E280A', 'E280B')
GROUP BY A.MANDT,A.WOKNUM, A.CRDAT, A.IDNRK, B.CRDAT
) AS P4 ) AS P4
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT011 AS M11 ON M11.MANDT = P4.MANDT AND M11.MATNR = P4.IDNRK LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT013 AS M13 ON M13.MANDT = P4.MANDT AND M13.POSID = P4.WOKNUM || '-P' AND M13.MATNR = P4.IDNRK WHERE P4.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND P4.WOKNUM LIKE #POSID# || '%'
AND P4.WOKNUM LIKE '_%'
AND P4.CRDAT BETWEEN #UDATE1# AND #UDATE2# AND P4.LIFNR2 = #LIFNR# AND M13.STATE = '2' ) AS T3 WHERE 1=1) AS T
WHERE MENGE > MPASS
ORDER BY POSID, MATNR, CHNDAT, EINDT, UDATE FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
